blog.description: - Randa - 27 - TX - Cis she/her - My Paypal - Gaymer - Full-time fangirl - Writer/aspiring producer - Current obsessions: Critical Role, Killing Eve, & the MCU - Lifelong fan of superheroes, Star Wars, & fantasy - History buff, feminist, LGBT activist.

summary: I followed you a while ago because of Supergirl and Wonder Woman and then you started posting about Beau and CR and convinced me...
question: I followed you a while ago because of Supergirl and Wonder Woman and then you started posting about Beau and CR and convinced me to start watching Campaign 2. A year after those posts I’m a Dungeon Master to two groups and play in two groups. Your blog literally changed my life and I’m so thankful for it and you 💙
answer: I wanna cry, this is so awesome!! I wish I could give you a hug! That’s a lot of D&D!!

summary: the thought crossed my mind that the hug laura gave liam in this episode (46. when keyleth’s dad shows up and they’re being all...
body:
the thought crossed my mind that the hug laura gave liam in this episode (46. when keyleth’s dad shows up and they’re being all gushy and familyish) could totally have been in character vex and vax missing their mom…. or it could have just been laura noticing liam being sad. 

and now i’m a fucking mess of emotions bc i keep forgetting how heavy the real life shit liam was dealing with during this arc.

reblog.comment:

summary:
‪I had a dream the other night that I was back in high school and Matt Mercer was my art teacher. ‬
‪Only, I didn’t realize it...
body:
‪I had a dream the other night that I was back in high school and Matt Mercer was my art teacher. ‬


‪Only, I didn’t realize it was him until he gave me permission to go into the supplies basement to pick out the right paint color for my new character miniature, and I got in trouble with the school cop. When I told the cop that my teacher had given me permission to be there, he asked who my teacher was. I couldn’t remember his name, so I spent five minutes trying to describe his hair before saying “Oh my god, my teacher is Matt Mercer”‬


Then I woke up.

summary: On the cadeuces not being the healing rod thing, like I know the actual snake staff is the rod of asclepius where the cadeuces...
body: On the cadeuces not being the healing rod thing, like I know the actual snake staff is the rod of asclepius where the cadeuces is the symbol of Hermes. But Cadeucus has siblings, he has a brother and at least two sisters, maybe it’s not so much as a misnaming thing for talisen and is in fact a naming theme for the clay family. Maybe his brother is named asclepius and hes the actual healer of the family. Or maybe since Cad doesn’t seem to like his brother he was named Asclepius because his parents thought/wanted him to be a great healer but he turned out to walk a different path. Maybe Cadeuces isn’t named what he is because hes is or is supposed to be a healer, but instead he was named after the symbol of the God of messengs and travelers because hes supposed to spread the word of Melor the Wild Mother to Wildemount and the empire, kind of like how Pike brought back the worship of Saerenrae to tal'dori

Maybe Cadeuces isn’t named what he is because hes is or is supposed to be a healer, but instead he was named after the symbol of the God of messengs and travelers because hes supposed to spread the word of Melor the Wild Mother to Wildemount and the empire, kind of like how Pike brought back the worship of Saerenrae to tal'dori

But Cadeucus has siblings, he has a brother and at least two sisters, maybe it’s not so much as a misnaming thing for talisen and is in fact a naming theme for the clay family. Maybe his brother is named asclepius and hes the actual healer of the family. Or maybe since Cad doesn’t seem to like his brother he was named Asclepius because his parents thought/wanted him to be a great healer but he turned out to walk a different path. Maybe Cadeuces isn’t named what he is because hes is or is supposed to be a healer, but instead he was named after the symbol of the God of messengs and travelers because hes supposed to spread the word of Melor the Wild Mother to Wildemount and the empire, kind of like how Pike brought back the worship of Saerenrae to tal'dori

blog.name: folktalesofexandria
blog.title: Folk . Tales . of . Exandria
blog.description:
You've heard it from the Cobalt Soul archivists. Now hear it from the wandering bards of Exandria...

-

The official tumblr of the unofficial Critical Role fanfiction zine, organised by @sparxwrites and @notalwaysweak.

title: Spreading the Word
body:
If you’re excited about the zine and want to help us get the word out (there’s only ~50 of you following the blog so far! We’re delighted to have you, but there’s so many more Critters out there to reach), but you’re not sure how, then here’s some suggestions:

  • Follow us on tumblr and twitter, and reblog/retweet our stuff. This is probably the easiest, most low-effort thing you can do, and it’s super helpful!
  • (On a related note, here’s our teaser posts on tumblr and twitter. Go wild. Reblog/retweet them every night until sign-ups open, if you’re really keen and / or just fancy testing your followers’ patience.)
  • Blog about us using the hashtag #folk tales of exandria or @folktalesofexandria on tumblr, or tweet about us using the hastag #ftoe or @crfolktales on twitter.
  • Reach out to Critter friends! Especially if they’re writers (we’d love an application from them), but readers, fanartists, and lurkers as well. Fanartists in particular often have larger followings than fic writers, especially on twitter, and if they’re happy to help spread the word then they can reach a lot of people!
  • Reach out to writers you like! Even if you don’t know them well, a link to the blog and a “I’d love to see your work in this zine :)” is pretty flattering for an author (and also means you may well get to see their work in the zine!). Tagging them in reblogs works too!
  • If you have (or are a member of) a Critical Role discord group, drop a link to our blog / twitter / teaser posts in the general/fic channels, with a mention that any writers present might want to check it out. Even if it’s a Mighty Nein-era discord, there’ll be plenty of people who watched Vox Machina there as well!
  • If you’re on a Critical Role facebook group, dreamwidth group, any kind of group, same as above! Tell your D&D group! Tell your school / university friends! Tell the ghosts you hang out with at the cemetery on a Friday night!

Honestly, it really just boils down to “yell as loudly as you can, in as many places as you can, as loud as you can, about the zine”. If you can find louder people, or people who have more people listening to them yell, fantastic! Convince them to yell too. Every little helps!

Happy yelling :)

reblog.comment:

summary: Weird thought, but it seems vaguely possible to me that Beau could eventually be given the task of ‘stopping’ Fjord and Caleb if...
body: Weird thought, but it seems vaguely possible to me that Beau could eventually be given the task of ‘stopping’ Fjord and Caleb if their goals are discovered by the Cobalt Soul….maybe? Idk they aren’t evil governments but they are literally heading down very dangerous world altering paths.
